text: Ʋelei nuɓusɛi a ɓɔɛ la, ʋele ɠana gè ɓɔɛzu la, tɔɔzei wo-ɓusɛi ná-zɛbɛsulalai ʋa. Ʋelei mɔungi, wo wo-ɓusɛi pɛ dɔɔni la duɔlai zu, é ɠɛ ga kɔzɔba vai ta tɔ koloɠolo fai, ga wo ɗa eteai ziɛ tɔ koloɠologi zu, niizu à ɓɔɠɔ ve lɛɛ ɠana eɠɛ duɔiti, wo ɠɛ ga telebodai ɠɛ nuiti, ga wo eteai ziɛ ɲadedai zu.
